sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {
    ScatterChart,
    Scatter,
    XAxis,
    YAxis,
    CartesianGrid,
    Tooltip,
} from 'recharts'
import RechartCreator from 'app/components/charts/RechartCreator'

const data = [
    { x: 100, y: 200, z: 200 },
    { x: 120, y: 100, z: 260 },
    { x: 170, y: 300, z: 400 },
    { x: 140, y: 250, z: 280 },
    { x: 150, y: 400, z: 500 },
    { x: 110, y: 300, z: 100 },
    { x: 130, y: 250, z: 380 },
    { x: 110, y: 400, z: 400 },
    { x: 190, y: 280, z: 700 },
]

const SimpleScatterChart = ({ height, width }) => {
    return (
        <RechartCreator height={height} width={width}>
            <ScatterChart
                margin={{
                    top: 20,
                    right: 20,
                    bottom: 20,
                    left: 20,
                }}
            >
                <CartesianGrid />
                <XAxis type="number" dataKey="x" name="stature" unit="cm" />
                <YAxis type="number" dataKey="y" name="weight" unit="kg" />
                <Tooltip cursor={{ strokeDasharray: '3 3' }} />
                <Scatter name="A school" data={data} fill="#8884d8" />
            </ScatterChart>
        </RechartCreator>
    )
}

export default SimpleScatterChart
